identifier.genes: "array of gene identifiers that participate in the reaction"

metabolites.identifier: "identifier for metabolite that participates in reaction"
metabolites.compartment: "compartment in which metabolite participates in the reaction"

identifier.name: "reaction name"
identifier.process: "identifier for process of which reaction is a part"

network.explanation: "definition of nodes and links in network will occur after selection of sets"

metabolites.explanation: "either compartmental metabolites or general metabolites may constitute nodes"
